summary: The Marx Brothers help young Broadway hopefuls while thwarting diamond thieves.
cast: Harpo Marx|Chico Marx|Ilona Massey|Vera-Ellen|Marion Hutton|Raymond Burr|Melville Cooper|Bruce Gordon|Leon Belasco|Paul Valentine|Eric Blore|Marilyn Monroe|Groucho Marx|Eddie Borden|Sayre Dearing|Edward Gargan|Lois Hall|Alvin Hammer|Colin Keith-Johnston|Clarence Nash|House Peters Jr.|Constance Purdy|Otto Waldis
title: Amor en conserva
